chapters.title: Chapter 10: The Last of the Tabac
chapters.info: Lord Shimron, p. 173—Lord of Arad Doman. He was gaunt and white-haired. Shimron was one of Alsalam's most trusted advisors until he became Dragonsworn. He was high in the councils of the the Dragonsworn. He came to greet Ituralde at Lady Osana's hunting lodge and joined his campaign against the Seanchan. He was burned to death by a damane fireball. See also Ankaer; Rajabi; Wakeda.
